lead_paragraph: The building sustained major damage, and the blaze may have destroyed the 160-million-year-old bones of a dinosaur, local news outlets said.

headline.print_headline: Museum Fire in New Delhi  Guts Exhibits
headline.main: Fire Destroys Natural History Museum in New Delhi

snippet: The building sustained major damage, and the blaze may have destroyed the 160-million-year-old bones of a dinosaur, local news outlets said.
abstract: Fire rages through National Museum of Natural History in New Delhi, damaging building and destroying exhibits.
